title: Very fast battery drain on Pixel 2 after Android 10 update
content:
Since I updated my Pixel 2 to android 10 the battery is draining fast and the full charge last around half the time before the update.
Before in a normal day it lasted around 20 hours now hardly reaches 10 hours.
I tried the troubleshooting steps but it didn't help and the issue appeared exactly after the update.
I can also see many other users reporting the same issue on the support community and on reddit.

Has anyone reached a solution for this? 

Thanks
